solution_line_template: 1 hour is {minutes_per_hour} minutes, so {total_minutes} minutes is {total_minutes} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours.

During one hour a fox can make {speed_per_hour} kilometers, so during two hours, he would be able to run {speed_per_hour} * {total_hours} = <<{speed_per_hour}*{total_hours}={distance}>>{distance} kilometers.
